page.title: 08 A DAY ON WOOSEHILL
page.content: I wake and use the bathroom at 7 o'clock,eat breakfast downstairs,then I get ready for school and I play with my friends until the whistle.In class we write spellings and read until the register is taken.We work at Maths,English,Topic or Art until lunch time.I eat a packed lunch and afterwards I help clean and feed the guinea pigs.After a playtime we go in for afternoon school and work until 3 o'clock.At 3:30 we go home.I change my clothes and play out until my tea.My mum gives me and my sister teaand we watch T.V. until bedtime _ about 8 o'clock.I think Woosehill is a lovely place to live. {Angela age 8 {
